org.subjectj.compositor.build

Class ClassUpdateBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.subjectj.compositor.build.ClassUpdateBuilder

  • public class ClassUpdateBuilder
extends Object
    Allows for updating of existing class files so they correctly refer to the newly composed class files at runtime. Uses the Builder design pattern so the steps could easily be chained, i.e. into a composite function.
    Author:
    John Rivera

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassUpdateBuilder(org.objectweb.asm.tree.ClassNode classNode)
      Constructs a new ClassUpdateBuilder for updating a ClassNode.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClassUpdateBuilder updateClass(String oldClassName, String newClassName)
      Updates all references to an old class to a new class in the ClassNode contained in this ClassUpdateBuilder.
      ClassUpdateBuilder updateField(String oldFieldName, String newFieldName)
      Updates all references to a field to calls to a different field.
      ClassUpdateBuilder updateMethod(String oldMethodName, String newMethodName)
      Updates all calls to a method to calls to a different method.
      Path write(String classFile)
      Writes the updated ClassNode to a file.

    • Method Detail

      • updateClass

        public ClassUpdateBuilder updateClass(String oldClassName,
                                      String newClassName)
        Updates all references to an old class to a new class in the ClassNode contained in this ClassUpdateBuilder.
        Parameters:
        oldClassName - The class name references to be updated.
        newClassName - The class name to update to.
        Returns:
        A ClassUpdateBuilder containing the updated ClassNode.

      • updateMethod

        public ClassUpdateBuilder updateMethod(String oldMethodName,
                                       String newMethodName)
        Updates all calls to a method to calls to a different method. Not implemented yet.
        Parameters:
        oldMethodName - The name of the method to update the calls to.
        newMethodName - The name of the new method.
        Returns:
        A ClassBuilder with the updated composed class.

      • updateField

        public ClassUpdateBuilder updateField(String oldFieldName,
                                      String newFieldName)
        Updates all references to a field to calls to a different field. Not implemented yet.
        Parameters:
        oldFieldName - The name of the field to update the references to.
        newFieldName - The name of the new field.
        Returns:
        A ClassBuilder with the updated composed class.

      • write

        public Path write(String classFile)
           throws IOException
        Writes the updated ClassNode to a file.
        Parameters:
        classFile - The path to the file to be written to. If the file already exists, it will be overwritten without prompt.
        Returns:
        The Path representing the new file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs writing to the specified file.
